title: SSC chsl1 / Havaldar Recruitment 2025
description: The SSC MTS 2025 Recruitment, conducted by the Staff Selection Commission (SSC), offers opportunities for 10th-pass candidates to join as Multi-Tasking Staff (MTS) in various government departments and as Havaldar in CBIC and CBN. The notification was released on June 26, 2025, announcing 1,075 Havaldar vacancies, with MTS vacancies to be updated later. Candidates aged 18–25 (MTS/CBN) or 18–27 (CBIC/some MTS posts) can apply from June 26 to July 24, 2025 via ssc.gov.in. The Computer-Based Test (CBT) is scheduled from September 20 to October 24, 2025. The selection process includes CBT (Session 1 & 2), PET/PST (for Havaldar), and Document Verification. The pay scale is ₹18,000–₹22,000 (Level 1, 7th Pay Commission), making it an attractive Sarkari Naukri option. Stay updated at ssc.gov.in for results and further announcements.[](https://www.shiksha.com/exams/ssc-mts-exam)[](https://www.careerpower.in/ssc-mts.html)[](https://www.shiksha.com/exams/ssc-mts-exam-notification)

vacancydetails.postname: Lower Division Clerk/ Junior Secretariat Assistant

title: SSC CHSL Recruitment Apply  Online 2025
description: SSC CHSL 2025 is a highly competitive government job exam conducted by the Staff Selection Commission to recruit 12th-pass candidates for various Group C posts like LDC, JSA, DEO, and PA/SA in central government departments, with the official notification expected soon on www.ssc.nic.in; aspirants must meet the eligibility criteria of 10+2 qualification and age between 18 to 27 years, and prepare well for the Tier 1 (CBT), Tier 2 (Descriptive), and Skill Test stages by following the latest SSC CHSL syllabus, previous year papers, and mock tests to secure high-paying government jobs with job security, promotions, and all-India service scope—stay updated with trusted platforms like JobForSarkari.com for SSC CHSL 2025 notification, syllabus PDF, exam dates, application form, vacancy details, cut-off, and result announcements.

vacancydetails.postname: Lower Division Clerk/ Junior Secretariat Assistant
